Jenday Conure

Conures Central & South America

A very colorful conure, often confused with the Sun Conure. They have a bright yellow head and chest, an orange-red belly, green wings, and a blue tail.

Datos R치pidos

Tama침o

12 inches (30.5 cm). Weight: 110-130g (3.9-4.6 oz)

Peso Promedio

120 g

Nivel de Ruido

Very Loud. They have a sharp, piercing screech that is on par with a Sun Conure's. They are not shy about using their voice.

Origen

Central & South America

Temperamento y Personalidad

Very playful, affectionate, and cuddly. They are known for their high energy levels and love to be the center of attention. Can be nippy if over-excited.

Vocalizaci칩n y Capacidad de Habla

Can learn a few words and phrases. They are better at mimicking sounds and can be quite vocal with their natural calls.

Dieta y Alimentaci칩n

A high-quality pelleted diet, with daily offerings of fresh vegetables and fruits. A varied diet is key to their health.

Salud y Longevidad

A hardy species with a lifespan of 25-30 years, but require a lot of social interaction to prevent behavioral problems like feather plucking.

Alojamiento

Unsuitable for most apartment situations due to their high noise level. A cage of at least 24"W x 20"D x 30"H is recommended.
